details: Mission Youth is mandated to enhance the employability of youth in emerging market Job Markets through targeted market-driven skilling programmes.
benefits: The trainings are given in focus sectors at Tourism, IT, handicrafts, Retail, Agriculture, construction, and other focus sectors of Jammu & Kashmir.
eligibility: Candidates must have passed the qualifying examination prescribed for a particular training programme/course;
Benefits under the scheme can be availed by a particular candidate only once irrespective of the sector/nature of training;
Candidates who have already completed Skilling Training in any trade under any Government scheme will not be eligible to get benefits under this scheme.
Candidates covered under the scheme shall have to attend all mandatory training sessions as prescribed under any particular course.
40% of the number of sanctioned slots shall be earmarked for female candidates.
application_process: Applicants have to register themselves into the portal.
documents_required: No Documents required for this Scheme

frequently_asked_questions.question: What is the Objective of the Scheme?
frequently_asked_questions.answer: To impart Market Driven Skill Development programmes for youth of Jammu and Kashmir

frequently_asked_questions.question: Who is eligible for this programme?
frequently_asked_questions.answer: Any candidate between the age of 18-35 is eligible for this programme.

frequently_asked_questions.question: What Is The Duration Of The Programme?
frequently_asked_questions.answer: The programme is of the duration between 3 weeks to 5 months.

frequently_asked_questions.question: What kind of Trainings are provided?
frequently_asked_questions.answer: The trainings are given in focus sectors at Tourism, IT, handicrafts, Retail, Agriculture, construction, and other focus sectors of the Jammu & Kashmir.

frequently_asked_questions.question: Are there trainings on Entrepreneurship Development?
frequently_asked_questions.answer: Mission youth runs trainings for budding entrepreneurs in collaboration with JKEDI wherein the trainings related to business are given to candidates

frequently_asked_questions.question: What are the other big initiatives of Mission Youth?
frequently_asked_questions.answer: Mission Youth runs a comprehensive training programme in collaboration with BSE limited in the Job roles related to banking, insurance, and Finance sector.
